Hi. This is the official text-form design document of DraftUP

It will provide the following:
- Tech Stack information
- Layout


Tech Stack information
- Ruby on Rails
- Atom Text Editor
- Mozilla Firefox
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript


Layout
- Provide the following webpages
   * Home page
   * Log in page
   * Sign up page
   * DraftUP Proper page
   * Collaboration page
   *
